data_table.description: The subject consent data table contains subject IDs, consent information, and subject aliases for probands with Down syndrome due to standard trisomy 21 and their biological parents.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects

variable.name: SUBJECT_SOURCE
variable.description: Coriell for HapMap samples, blank otherwise

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Coriell ID for HapMap samples, blank otherwise
